subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan erased a sluggish performance with a rebound and a putback with 50.4 seconds left, preserving a slim, late lead that the San Antonio Spurs parlayed into a 97-91 victory over the Mavericks in Dallas.
snippet: Tim Duncan erased a sluggish performance with a rebound and a putback with 50.4 seconds left, preserving a slim, late lead that the San Antonio Spurs parlayed into a 97-91 victory over the Mavericks in Dallas.
